about_the_game:
Welcome to Night Light City, a dark, dystopian sentient alien City. You play as a seductive and powerful female bioweapon, feared by a sentient city and wanted by four factions. How she responds is up to you, as you discover the secrets of Night Light City. Immerse yourself into a cyberpunk 2D cinematic metroidvaina and beat 'em up hybrid.



Uncover the secrets and truth of this dark sentient city as a hard-boiled alien detective

Utilise your monstrous powers and devour your prey and merge with their DNA to restore or instill your reputation. Your cases will include simple to mature-themed scenarios

Experience the sentient emote system that you can use to interrogate, manipulate, terrorize, or sway the odds in your favor

Feel like a powerful alien bioweapon as you unleash your unstoppable powers and devour and absorb the DNA of your prey and unleash it into the City

Combat and hunt down sentient enemies of varying species and sizes, using the slick combo, guns, weapons, and different DNA-infused move-sets to crush your foes

Put your agile and athletic body to use as you parkour, doge, slide, fight, impale, hack, devour and hunt your prey

Engage in an epic True Film Noir, and neo Cyberpunk story with bustling culture and characters to discover and explore along the way. Each case, small or big will reveal your true nature

content_descriptors.notes: Some story elements may contain violence, controversial acts/topics, bad language and some nude scenes.

detailed_description:
Welcome to Night Light City, a dark, dystopian sentient alien City. You play as a seductive and powerful female bioweapon, feared by a sentient city and wanted by four factions. How she responds is up to you, as you discover the secrets of Night Light City. Immerse yourself into a cyberpunk 2D cinematic metroidvaina and beat 'em up hybrid.



Uncover the secrets and truth of this dark sentient city as a hard-boiled alien detective

Utilise your monstrous powers and devour your prey and merge with their DNA to restore or instill your reputation. Your cases will include simple to mature-themed scenarios

Experience the sentient emote system that you can use to interrogate, manipulate, terrorize, or sway the odds in your favor

Feel like a powerful alien bioweapon as you unleash your unstoppable powers and devour and absorb the DNA of your prey and unleash it into the City

Combat and hunt down sentient enemies of varying species and sizes, using the slick combo, guns, weapons, and different DNA-infused move-sets to crush your foes

Put your agile and athletic body to use as you parkour, doge, slide, fight, impale, hack, devour and hunt your prey

Engage in an epic True Film Noir, and neo Cyberpunk story with bustling culture and characters to discover and explore along the way. Each case, small or big will reveal your true nature
legal_notice: In proprietary software, an end-user license agreement (EULA) or software license agreement is the contract between the licencor and purchaser, establishing the purchaser's right to use the software. All content, except some Orb Soundwerx music tracks, are copyrighted to Turbulon Interactive/Night Sauce. Purchaser has rights to use license to play, partially capture motion or all of the still visuals of the content under Fair Use. Purchaser must not include or copy any of the material (including audio) under the license agreement and redistribute to other purchasers.
name: Sentient Noir

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 4200 CPU 1.60Hz 2.30Hz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphic Family or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard sound-card or better
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard support (Xbox controller recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 - 9700 CPU 3.00GHZ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 2080 SUPER
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard sound-card or better
  • Additional Notes: Xbox controller
